text: is a former Japanese international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== Hayashi won a gold medal in the doubles with Norikazu Fujii at the 1952 World Table Tennis Championships . He also won a bronze medal in the men's team event at the 1952 World Table Tennis Championships. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Japanese male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Tadaaki Hayashi
